text: give me a number handed me honey to
Arkansas we were mmm I'm really worried
I can't eat I can't sleep I even have an
ulcer sometimes I feel very faint due to
worry
and my children are equally worried
often they start crying and calling out
for their sibling who's still missing
they must be sitting on their backsides
the government otherwise they would have
found and rescued those girls but to
date their efforts have yielded no fruit
we don't sleep much when we go to bed
we're scared and worried sometimes we
don't go to bed for fear we just stay up
honestly there's a lot of fear we're not
able to sleep well all we can do is put
our faith in God and hope that the
situation improves the government is
doing nothing at all honestly if they
were doing anything serious they would
have found the girls by now
I honestly don't see any effort they're
making right now things are not too bad
we thank God things are a bit calmer
